attributes.action: Tell Johnson to start fracking  now,cheap reliable energy .
attributes.additional_details: We need a secure energy scource fracking provides that ,after all we are importing shale gas from America ,so why not use the vast reserves under our feet,providing well paid jobs.
attributes.background: Open up the wells and start tracking now.It is cheap,clean and most importantly generates power whatever the weather.Solar panels are inefficient and need fuul sun,wind turbines no wind no power equals power cuts.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a very similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608745
